====== AidView ======
/* Please provide a brief description of the tool, and upload a screenshot if possible. Include details of the tool creator. */

[[http://www.aidview.net|AidView]] is an tablet optimised interface for exploring IATI data. An alpha version was produced ahead of the [[http://www.aideffectiveness.org/busanhlf4/| Busan Forum on Aid Effectiveness]] and development of the beta is currently underway managed by [[community:users:siwhitehouse|Simon Whitehouse]].
